description:
Veil is depressed that Meguru knows who she really is. But when Meguru comes to visit her anyway, it only strengthens their friendship. Veil insists to Nui that she won`t fight anymore, and the two explain to Mary that they`re leaving the organization. In response, Mary hatches a plan...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 理想とリアルとリトマス紙
